Description:
Detects wmiexec/dcomexec/atexec/smbexec from Impacket framework

Author: Ecco, oscd.community, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Tim Rauch
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Potential Impacket Lateral Movement Activity
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((parent_process_path like '%\wmiprvse.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\mmc.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\explorer.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\services.exe') and (command like '%cmd.exe%' and command like '%/q%' and command like '%/c%' and command like '%\\\\127.0.0.1\\%' and command like '%&1%')) or ((parent_command_line like '%svchost.exe -k netsvcs%' or parent_command_line like '%taskeng.exe%') and (command like '%cmd.exe%' and command like '%/c%' and command like '%windows\temp\%' and command like '%&1%')))
